description: Powers of fourth root of 6 rounded down.
links: Charles R Greathouse IV, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..5140
prog: (MAGMA) [Floor(6^(n/4)) : n in [0..40]]; // _Wesley Ivan Hurt_, Aug 28 2015(PARI) a(n)=if(n%2, sqrtnint(6^n,4), if(n%4, sqrtint(6^(n/2)), 6^(n/4))) \\ _Charles R Greathouse IV_, Aug 29 2015
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_
